bug.author: silvermissile
bug.summary: can't list files in ufs hdfs path
bug.description:
**Alluxio Version:**alluxio-2.0.0 Describe the bug can't list files in some ufs hdfs path #there are file in the path hdfs@89:/home/ubuntu$ hdfs dfs -ls /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db | wc -l 17 hdfs@89:/home/ubuntu$ hdfs dfs -ls /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db | wc -l 28739
# can not list ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs ls /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/ or bin/alluxio fs ls -f /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/
ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ nothing****
ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs copyFromLocal logs/worker.log /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db Copied file://~/alluxio-2.0.0/logs/worker.log to /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db
ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs ls /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/worker.log -rw-r--r-- hive hive 952886 TO_BE_PERSISTED 09-27-2019 09:17:08:789 100% /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/worker.log ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs persist /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/worker.log Found 1 files to persist.
ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs free /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/worker.log Cannot free file /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/worker.log which is not persisted ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs ls /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db
ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs checkConsistency /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db is consistent with the under storage system.
ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs ls /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/ -rw-r--r-- hive hive 952886 TO_BE_PERSISTED 09-27-2019 09:17:08:789 100% /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/worker.log ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$
ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs rm /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/worker.log /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/worker.log has been removed
ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs ls -f /user/hive/warehouse/backtrace.db/ ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs load /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/ /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db loaded ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs ls /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/ ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ bin/alluxio fs ls -Dalluxio.user.file.metadata.sync.interval=0 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/ ubuntu@160:~/alluxio-2.0.0$ also happen on UI <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5319647/65759798-4ef6b300-e14e-11e9-8471-b46a83c21c8f.png></denchmark-link>
no logs found in log dir

comments.comment:
though I have config alluxio.security.login.username=hive, and <denchmark-code>drwxrwx--x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxrwx--x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxrwx--x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxrwx--x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxrwx--x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxrwx--x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:42 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxr-xr-x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxr-xr-x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxr-xr-x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxr-xr-x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxr-xr-x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxr-xr-x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxr-xr-x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxr-xr-x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxr-xr-x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx drwxr-xr-x - zengwb hive 0 2019-09-27 10:41 /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db/xxx </denchmark-code>
any way ,solved through: hdfs dfs -chmod -R a+r /user/hive/warehouse/binlog.db
